name: @farazahmad759/dricup-crud-express
description: A CLI to quickly create Express JS Api's

scripts.git:merge-feature-in-development: git checkout development && git merge feature && git push origin development && git checkout feature
scripts.git:merge-development-in-main: git checkout main && git merge development && git push origin main && git checkout feature
scripts.git:merge-main-in-v1.0: git checkout v1.0 && git merge main && git push origin v1.0 && git checkout feature

author: Faraz Ahmad
